appearedOnTime.description: UTC time on which the alert appeared

AlertFilter.description: Filters that can be specified on the alert

nextLink.description: Id of the next page of alerts

appearedAtSourceTime.description: UTC time at which the alert appeared on the source

appearedAtTime.description: UTC time at which the alert appeared

clearedAtSourceTime.description: UTC time at which the alert was cleared on the source

clearedAtTime.description: UTC time at which the alert got cleared

recommendation.description: Recommendation for acting on the alert

AlertSettings.description: AlertSettings on the device which represents how alerts will be processed

additionalRecipientEmailList.description: List of email addresses (apart from admin/co-admin of subscription) to whom the alert emails need to be sent

alertNotificationCulture.description: Culture setting to be used while building alert emails. For eg: "en-US"

emailNotification.description: Value indicating whether user/admins will receive emails when an alert condition occurs on the system

notificationToServiceOwners.description: Value indicating whether service owners will receive emails when an alert condition occurs on the system. Applicable only if emailNotification flag is Enabled.

AlertSettingsProperties.description: Class containing the properties of AlertSettings

AlertSource.description: source at which the alert can be raised

encryptionCertificateThumbprint.description: Thumbprint certificate that was used to encrypt "Value"

value.description: The value of the secret itself. If the secret is in plaintext then EncryptionAlgorithm will be none and EncryptionCertThumbprint will be null.

AsymmetricEncryptedSecret.description: This class can be used as the Type for any secret entity represented as Password, CertThumbprint, Algorithm. This class is intended to be used when the secret is encrypted with an asymmetric key pair. The encryptionAlgorithm field is mainly for future usage to potentially allow different entities encrypted using different algorithms.

name.description:
Gets or sets the name of the operation being performed on this particular object
Return value format: "{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{read|write|deletion|action}"
Eg: Microsoft.StorSimple/managers/devices/fileServers/read
    Microsoft.StorSimple/managers/devices/alerts/clearAlerts/action

origin.description:
Gets or sets Origin
The intended executor of the operation; governs the display of the operation in the RBAC UX and the audit logs UX.
Default value is user,system

description.description:
Gets or sets Description
The localized friendly description for the operation, as it should be shown to the user. 
It should be thorough, yet concise  it will be used in tool tips and detailed views.

operation.description:
Gets or sets Operation
The localized friendly name for the operation, as it should be shown to the user. 
It should be concise (to fit in drop downs) but clear (i.e. self-documenting). It should use Title Casing and include the entity/resource to which it applies.

provider.description:
Gets or sets Provider
The localized friendly form of the resource provider name  it is expected to also include the publisher/company responsible. 
It should use Title Casing and begin with Microsoft for 1st party services.

resource.description:
Gets or sets Resource
The localized friendly form of the resource type related to this action/operation  it should match the public documentation for the resource provider. 
It should use Title Casing  for examples, please refer to the name section.

AvailableProviderOperationDisplay.description:
Contains the localized display information for this particular operation / action. 
These value will be used by several clients for 
(1) custom role definitions for RBAC; 
(2) complex query filters for the event service; and (3) audit history / records for management operations.

AvailableProviderOperations.description: Class for set of operations used for discovery of available provider operations.

dataPolicy.description: The data policy of backed up endpoint.

createdTime.description: The time when the backup was created.

expirationTime.description: The time when the backup will expire.

initiatedBy.description: Indicates how the backup was initiated "Manual | Scheduled".

targetId.description: The path id of the target FileServer or IscsiServer for which the backup was taken.

targetType.description: Type of target, FileServer or IscsiServer

BackupScheduleGroupList.description: The list response of backup schedule groups

alerts.description: List of alert Ids to be cleared

resolutionMessage.description: Resolution message while clearing the request

newEndpointName.description: Name of new endpoint which will created as part of clone job.

targetAccessPointId.description: Access point Id on which clone job will performed.

targetDeviceId.description: DeviceId of the device which will act as the Clone target

Device.description: Represents a StorSimple device object along with its properties

availableLocalStorageInBytes.description: Local pending storage available on the device in bytes

availableStorageInBytes.description: Total pending available storage on the device in bytes

endpointCount.description: Total number of endpoints that are currently on the device ( i.e. number of shares on FileServer or number of volumes on IscsiServer)

provisionedLocalStorageInBytes.description: Storage in bytes that has been provisioned locally on the device

provisionedStorageInBytes.description: Storage in bytes that has been provisioned on the device including both local and cloud

totalBackupSizeInBytes.description: Total size taken up by backups in bytes

totalLocalStorageInBytes.description: Total local storage capacity in device in bytes.

totalStorageInBytes.description: Total storage available on the device in bytes.

usingLocalStorageInBytes.description: Local Storage that is being currently used in bytes

usingStorageInBytes.description: Storage that is being currently used in bytes including both local and cloud

DeviceDetails.description: Class containing more granular details about the device

deviceDescription.description: Short description given for the device

DevicePatch.description: Class that represents the Input for the PATCH call on Device. Currently the only patchable property on device is "DeviceDescription"

activationTime.description: The UTC time at which the device was activated

allowedDeviceOperations.description: Operations that are allowed on the device based on its current state

culture.description: Language culture setting on the device. For eg: "en-US"

deviceCapabilities.description: Device can be configured either as FileServer or IscsiServer

deviceConfigurationStatus.description: "Complete" if the device has been successfully registered as File/IscsiServer and the creation of share/volume is complete, "Pending" if the device is only registered but the creation of share/volume is complete is still pending

deviceDescription.description: Short description given for the device

deviceSoftwareVersion.description: Version number of the software running on the device

domainName.description: Fully qualified name of the domain to which the device is attached

friendlySoftwareName.description: Friendly name for the software version

DeviceProperties.description: Encases all the properties of the Device

encryptionStatus.description: The encryption status which indicates if encryption is enabled or not.

keyRolloverStatus.description: The key rollover status which indicates if key rollover is required or not. If secrets encryption has been upgraded, then it requires key rollover.

description.description: The description of the file server

adminUser.description: The user/group who will have full permission in this share. Active directory email address. Example: xyz@contoso.com or Contoso\xyz.

localUsedCapacityInBytes.description: The local used capacity in Bytes.

provisionedCapacityInBytes.description: The total provisioned capacity in Bytes

gateway.description: The gateway of the network adapter.

ipAddress.description: The IP address of the network adapter, either ipv4 or ipv6.

prefixLength.description: The prefix length of the network adapter.

IPConfig.description: Details related to the IP address configuration

localUsedCapacityInBytes.description: The local used capacity in bytes.

endTime.description: The UTC time at which the job completed

percentComplete.description: The percentage of the job that is already complete

startTime.description: The UTC time at which the job was started

code.description: The code intended for programmatic access

message.description: The message intended to describe the error in detail

JobErrorDetails.description: The job error information containing List of JobErrorItem.

code.description: The code intended for programmatic access

message.description: The message intended to describe the error in detail

startTime.description: The start time of the job.

JobFilter.description: Filters that can be specified for the job

backupPointInTime.description: The time of the backup used for the failover.

deviceId.description: The device id in which the job is currently running

entityId.description: The entity identifier for which the job ran.

entityType.description: The entity type for which the job ran.

isCancellable.description: Represents whether the job is cancellable or not

sourceDeviceId.description: The source device identifier of the failover job.

targetId.description: Id of the object that is created by the job

targetType.description: The target type of the backup.

errorCode.description: The error code of the stage if any.

message.description: The message of the job stage.

JobStage.description: Contains details about the multiple job stages of a job

JobStats.description: Stats that are available for all jobs in common

ManagerExtendedInfo.description: The extended info of the manager.

algorithm.description: Represents the encryption algorithm used to encrypt the other keys. None - if EncryptionKey is saved in plain text format. AlgorithmName - if encryption is used

encryptionKey.description: Represents the CEK of the resource

encryptionKeyThumbprint.description: Represents the Cert thumbprint that was used to encrypt the CEK

integrityKey.description: Represents the CIK of the resource

portalCertificateThumbprint.description: Represents the portal thumbprint which can be used optionally to encrypt the entire data before storing it.

version.description: Represents the version of the ExtendedInfo object being persisted

type.description: Refers to the type of the StorSimple Manager

ManagerIntrinsicSettings.description: Intrinsic settings which refers to the type of the StorSimple manager

ManagerList.description: List of StorSimple Managers under a particular resourceGroup

tags.description: The tags attached to the StorSimple Manager.

provisioningState.description: Specifies the state of the resource as it is getting provisioned. Value of "Succeeded" means the Manager was successfully created

name.description: Refers to the sku name which should be "Standard"

retention.description: The retention period for the metric at the specified timegrain

timeGrain.description: The time grain, specifies the aggregation interval for the metric.

MetricAvailablity.description: Metric availability specifies the time grain (aggregation interval or frequency) and the retention period for that time grain

average.description: The average of all sample for the given instance

count.description: The count of samples of the metric data available for the given instance

maximum.description: The maximum of all samples available

minimum.description: The minimum of all samples available

sum.description: The sum of all the samples available in the given instance of time for the specific metric data

timeStamp.description: The time when the metric data is fetched

MetricDefinition.description: Monitoring metric definition represents the metadata of the metrics.

MetricFilter.description: class representing the filters to be passed while fetching metrics

MetricNameFilter.description: Class representing the name filter to be passed while fetching metrics

dimensions.description: The Metric dimension which indicates the source of the metric

timeGrain.description: The time grain, time grain indicates frequency of the metric data

type.description: The Type of the metric data

unit.description: The unit of the metric data

linkSpeed.description: The speed of the network adapter.

networkAdapterName.description: The name of the network adapter.

NetworkAdapter.description: Represents a networkAdapter in a particular node.

nodeNetworks.description: The NetworkAdapters under each node of the device.

primaryDnsServer.description: The Primary DNS server for the device

secondaryDnsServer.description: The secondary DNS server for the device

networkAdapters.description: The array of network adapters in the node.

NodeNetwork.description: Represents a single node in a device.

certificate.description: Gets or sets the base64 encoded certificate raw data string

location.description: The Geo location of the Manager

certificate.description: Gets or sets the base64 encoded certificate raw data string

ResourceCertificateAndAADDetails.description: Resource Certificate And AAD Details from IDM

emailList.description: List of emails to send the test alerts

SendTestAlertEmailRequest.description: Request for sending test alert email

StorageAccountCredentialList.description: Collection of Storage account credential entities

enableSSL.description: SSL needs to be enabled or not

value.description: The value of the secret itself. If the secret is in plaintext or null then EncryptionAlgorithm will be none

valueCertificateThumbprint.description: Thumbprint cert that was used to encrypt "Value"

SymmetricEncryptedSecret.description: This class can be used as the Type for any secret entity represented as Value, ValueCertificateThumbprint, EncryptionAlgorithm. In this case, "Value" is a secret and the "valueThumbprint" represents the certificate thumbprint of the value. The algorithm field is mainly for future usage to potentially allow different entities encrypted using different algorithms.

primaryTimeServer.description: The primary Network Time Protocol (NTP) server name, like 'time.windows.com'.

secondaryTimeServer.description: The secondary Network Time Protocol (NTP) server name, like 'time.contoso.com'. It's optional.

timeZone.description: The timezone of device, like '(UTC -06:00) Central America'

UpdateInstallProgress.description: Class representing the progress during installation of updates

deviceLastScannedTime.description: The last time when the device did an update scan.

inProgressDownloadJobId.description: If a download is in progress, this field contains the JobId of that particular download job

inProgressDownloadJobStartedTime.description: The time when the currently running download (if any) started

inProgressInstallJobId.description: If an install is in progress, this field contains the JobId of that particular install job

inProgressInstallJobStartedTime.description: The time when the currently running install (if any) started

inProgressScanStartedTime.description: The time when the currently running scan (if any) started

lastCompletedDownloadJobTime.description: The time when the last Download job was completed (success|cancelled|failed) on the device.

lastCompletedInstallJobTime.description: The time when the last Install job was completed (success|cancelled|failed) on the device.

lastCompletedScanTime.description: The time when the last scan job was completed (success|cancelled|failed) on the device.

rebootRequiredForInstall.description: Set to true if RegularUpdatesAvailable is true and if at least one of the updateItems detected has needs a reboot to install.

regularUpdatesAvailable.description: Set to true if regular updates were detected for the current version of the device.

totalItemsPendingForDownload.description: The total number of items pending for download.

totalItemsPendingForInstall.description: The total number of items pending for install.
